page.title: 18Adult Recreation.
page.content: The most popular recreational adult activities are watching rugby,playing bingo and playing darts and pool. Visiting public houses and clubs are also high on the list of enjoyable activities.Many villages have their own Rugby teams which compete in local leagues.Many public houses have their own darts teams (male and female)and also pool teams too.These also have league tables.Pool is a form of snooker. Watching television is the main activity pursued by almost all the population.This is the most passive entertainment there is,but as there are a variety of programmes people do not get bored.Television provides "company" for lonely people.
